entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Corner Brook 07:30 AM NDT Thursday 28 April 2016

Humidity: 84 %

Dewpoint: -4.8°C

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning early this morning. Flurries and rain showers this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this morning then northwest 30 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 28 April 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries or rain showers ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Snowfall amount 5 cm over higher terrain. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 28 April 2016

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
